name: Boat Violence: Ship Happens
description:
Boat Violence is a 4-player local party game where you use your pirate ship to outplay, outwit and MURDER your opponents. Load your cannons and get ready to hurt your friends.

Game features:
- 4 player versus arena battle
- 5 game modes
- 8 maps
- 15 power-ups

The game can currently be played ONLY against your friends, (2 to 4 players). You need at least one friend in the same room in order to play. Best played within punching distance of your friends.
